languages.text: Each time an ally in the 3-cell radius around the Cyber-Mastiff receives an extra turn, it makes a free, single attack against an adjacent enemy (if there is one).

traits.locale_text: Each time an ally in the 3-cell radius around the Cyber-Mastiff receives an extra turn, it makes a free, single attack against an adjacent enemy (if there is one).

languages.text: When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately (before the extra turn starts) makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.

traits.locale_text: When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately (before the extra turn starts) makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.
When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.

When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately (before the extra turn starts) makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.

languages.text: Cuando un aliado situado en un radio de 3 casillas en torno al cibermastín reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}, el cibermastín efectúa inmediatamente (antes de que empiece ese turno extra) un único ataque gratuito contra un enemigo adyacente (si lo hay).
languages.original_text: When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately (before the extra turn starts) makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un aliado situado en un radio de 3 casillas en torno al cibermastín reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}, el cibermastín efectúa inmediatamente (antes de que empiece ese turno extra) un único ataque gratuito contra un enemigo adyacente (si lo hay).

languages.text: 当距离生化獒犬3格内的盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，生化獒犬会在额外回合开始之前，立刻对一名临近敌人进行一次无消耗的单体攻击。
languages.original_text: When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately (before the extra turn starts) makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.

traits.locale_text: 当距离生化獒犬3格内的盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，生化獒犬会在额外回合开始之前，立刻对一名临近敌人进行一次无消耗的单体攻击。

languages.text: Lorsqu'un allié se trouvant dans un rayon de 3 cases autour du cyber-mastiff obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}, ce dernier lance, le cas échéant, une attaque ponctuelle gratuite sur un ennemi adjacent avant le début du tour supplémentaire.
languages.original_text: When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately (before the extra turn starts) makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un allié se trouvant dans un rayon de 3 cases autour du cyber-mastiff obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}, ce dernier lance, le cas échéant, une attaque ponctuelle gratuite sur un ennemi adjacent avant le début du tour supplémentaire.

languages.text: Siber mastifin etrafındaki 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan bir dost birim {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandığında siber mastif, varsa bitişikteki bir düşmana anında (ek tur başlamadan önce) serbest bir tek saldırı gerçekleştirir.
languages.original_text: When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately (before the extra turn starts) makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.

traits.locale_text: Siber mastifin etrafındaki 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan bir dost birim {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandığında siber mastif, varsa bitişikteki bir düşmana anında (ek tur başlamadan önce) serbest bir tek saldırı gerçekleştirir.

languages.text: Когда союзник в радиусе 3 клеток от кибермастифа получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, кибермастиф немедленно (до начала дополнительного хода) совершает одиночную атаку вне лимита атак на ход против врага на соседней клетке, если таковой есть.
languages.original_text: When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately (before the extra turn starts) makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник в радиусе 3 клеток от кибермастифа получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, кибермастиф немедленно (до начала дополнительного хода) совершает одиночную атаку вне лимита атак на ход против врага на соседней клетке, если таковой есть.

Когда союзник в радиусе 3 клеток от кибермастифа получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, кибермастиф немедленно (до начала дополнительного хода) совершает одиночную атаку вне лимита атак на ход против врага на соседней клетке, если таковой есть.

languages.text: サイ バー・マスティフの周囲3セル以内の味方が{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g} を得たとき、サイ バー・マスティフは直ちに（追加ターンが始まる前に）隣接している敵がいる場合、その敵に 対して無料の単体攻撃を行う。
languages.original_text: When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately (before the extra turn starts) makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.

traits.locale_text: サイ バー・マスティフの周囲3セル以内の味方が{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g} を得たとき、サイ バー・マスティフは直ちに（追加ターンが始まる前に）隣接している敵がいる場合、その敵に 対して無料の単体攻撃を行う。

languages.text: Erhält ein Verbündeter in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um den Cyber-Mastiff einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}, macht der Cyber-Mastiff sofort (vor dem Beginn des Zusatzzuges) einen kostenlosen Einzelangriff auf einen Gegner auf einem benachbarten Feld (sofern verfügbar).
languages.original_text: When an ally in a 3-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff immediately (before the extra turn starts) makes a free single attack against an adjacent enemy, if any.

traits.locale_text: Erhält ein Verbündeter in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um den Cyber-Mastiff einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}, macht der Cyber-Mastiff sofort (vor dem Beginn des Zusatzzuges) einen kostenlosen Einzelangriff auf einen Gegner auf einem benachbarten Feld (sofern verfügbar).
